def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 3):
        for x,y,z in permutations(config):
            check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
            check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
            check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
            check_y_light = is_light(y, ctx)
            check_y_tiny = is_small(y, ctx)
            check_y_above_right_x = is_above(y, x, ctx) and is_right(y, x, ctx)
            check_z_dark = is_dark(z, ctx)
            check_z_medium = is_medium_size(z, ctx)
            check_z_below_right_y = is_below(z, y, ctx) and is_right(z, y, ctx)
            if (
                check_xyz_close
                and check_x_dark
                and check_x_large
                and check_y_light
                and check_y_tiny
                and check_y_above_right_x
                and check_z_dark
                and check_z_medium
                and check_z_below_right_y
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x,y,z]))
    return results
state = turn(state)
